00020 
00021 #ifndef BITOPERATIONS_H
00022 #define BITOPERATIONS_H
00023 
00024 #define bit_get(p,m) ((p) & (m))
00025 #define bit_set(p,m) ((p) | (m))
00026 #define bit_clear(p,m) ((p) & ~(m))
00027 #define bit_flip(p,m) ((p) ^ (m))
00028 #define bit_invert(p) (~(p))
00029 //#define bit_write(c,p,m) (c ? bit_set(p,m) : bit_clear(p,m)) //lolwut?
00030 #define BIT(x) ((unsigned int)0x01 << (x))
00031 #define BIT_LONG(x) ((unsigned long)0x00000001 << (x))
00032 
00033 int bit_count(int flag);
00034 int BITS(int start, int end);
00035 
00036 #endif // BITOPERATIONS_H
